attributes.action: Council tax payment-defer the 10 month payments from Apr20-Jan21 to June20-Mar21
attributes.additional_details: To ease the financial  burden at the time it is needed for all of those people affected. This is not intended to renege on the payments due. Just a recognition and flexibility to adapt to the changing societal circumstances
attributes.background: Instruct local councils to move the 10 month payment schedule from April 20- Jan 21 to June 20-March 21. This defers payment and falls into line with the current Coronavirus issues related to mortgage payment deferrals -this ensures the council still receive the funds due within 10 month schedule
